lemma weakPar1: fixes \<Psi> :: 'b and R :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi" and P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi" and \<alpha> :: "'a action" and P' :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi" and Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi" and A\<^sub>Q :: "name list" and \<Psi>\<^sub>Q :: 'b assumes PTrans: "\<Psi> \<otimes> \<Psi>\<^sub>Q : R \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'" and FrQ: "extractFrame Q = \<langle>A\<^sub>Q, \<Psi>\<^sub>Q\<rangle>" and "bn \<alpha> \<sharp>* Q" and "A\<^sub>Q \<sharp>* \<Psi>" and "A\<^sub>Q \<sharp>* P" and "A\<^sub>Q \<sharp>* \<alpha>" and "A\<^sub>Q \<sharp>* R" shows "\<Psi> : R \<parallel> Q \<rhd> P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q"
